Description: BASIC QUALIFICATIONS- 1+ years of Microsoft Office products and applications experience- High school or equivalent- Work a flexible schedule/shift/work area, including weekends, nights, and/or holidays- Work 40 hours/week, and overtime as required- Can lift up to 49 pounds, stand/walk during shifts lasting up to 12 hours, and be able to frequently push, pull, squat, bend, and reachPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS- Bachelor degree in Engineering related fieldsJob Details
